sn41.5:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma kamabhu macchikasande viharati ambatakavane.
sn41.5:1.2: Atha kho citto gahapati yenayasma kamabhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam kamabhum abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho cittam gahapatim ayasma kamabhu etadavoca:
sn41.5:4.1: Imassa nu kho, gahapati, sankhittena bhasitassa katham vittharena attho datthabbo”ti?
sn41.5:4.2: “Kim nu kho etam, bhante, bhagavata bhasitan”ti?
sn41.5:4.4: “Tena hi, bhante, muhuttam agamehi yavassa attham pekkhami”ti.
sn41.5:4.5: Atha kho citto gahapati muhuttam tunhi hutva ayasmantam kamabhum etadavoca:
sn41.5:5.5: ‘Ratho’ti kho, bhante, imassetam catumahabhutikassa kayassa adhivacanam matapettikasambhavassa odanakummasupacayassa aniccucchadanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhamsanadhammassa.
sn41.5:5.6: Rago kho, bhante, nigho, doso nigho, moho nigho.
sn41.5:5.7: Te khinasavassa bhikkhuno pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn41.5:5.11: Sa khinasavassa bhikkhuno pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn41.5:5.13: Rago kho, bhante, bandhanam, doso bandhanam, moho bandhanam.
sn41.5:5.14: Te khinasavassa bhikkhuno pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn41.5:5.16: Iti kho, bhante, yam tam bhagavata vuttam:
sn41.5:7.1: Imassa kho, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanami”ti.
sn41.5:7.3: Yassa te gambhire buddhavacane pannacakkhu kamati”ti.
